dcterms:description: A dataset used for training and evaluating end-to-end Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) systems, consisting of 80 hours of read speech from the Wall Street Journal.
dcterms:title: 80-hour WSJ

dcterms:creator: Keyu An
Hongyu Xiang
Zhijian Ou
dcterms:description: A dataset used for training and evaluating end-to-end Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) systems, consisting of 300 hours of conversational speech from the Switchboard corpus.
dcterms:title: 300-hour Switchboard
